primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God, the living and active Sovereign, intervenes in human history to redeem His people and the entire created order, transforming them from exiles into witnesses.

tekstueel_bewijs: God is the subject of the verbs.
I the Lord will answer them.
I work and who can hinder it?
The mouth of the Lord has spoken it.

object.identificatie: Salvation/Redemption reaching the ends of the earth
tekstueel_bewijs: that my salvation may reach to the end of the earth
glorious redemption founded in his promise

zender.identificatie: The Holy One of Israel / The Sovereign Creator
tekstueel_bewijs: The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth.

ontvanger.identificatie: Israel and the entire human family
tekstueel_bewijs: for the sake of the entire human family
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: Does hearer identify with Subject or Receiver?

helper.identificatie: The Word of God / The Prophets
tekstueel_bewijs: so shall my word be that goes forth from my mouth; it shall not return to me empty

tegenstander.identificatie: Idols, Imperial Might, and Human Self-Centeredness
tekstueel_bewijs: dwarfed by colossal images of imperial might
the subject in so much of our preaching is ourselves
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad habits but 'elemental spirits' and 'imperial might' that challenge God's sovereignty.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The church (clergy) recovering its vocation as witnesses by shifting focus from self to God.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Preacher/Clergy
secundair_narratief_programma.object: A renewal of the knowledge of God
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The secondary program (witnessing) is a direct consequence of the primary program (God acting).

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.zender_naar_ontvanger: The Creator → Salvation → The Human Family

voorbeelden: The American church needs to be saved from itself.
they were seeking a setting where there is confidence in a living God.
that you may know and believe me.
I work and who can hinder it?
it shall accomplish that which I purpose.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The focus is entirely on God's power (Pouvoir) to accomplish His purpose, rather than human obligation (Devoir).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From the 'vague role' of God (Non-S1) to the 'Living God' (S1) who mocks the 'Idols' (S2).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: God asserts His own Subjectivity, rendering the human 'Subject' a 'Witness'.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; idols and imperial power are shown as real but ultimately impotent.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon explicitly critiques anthropocentric preaching and insists on God as the active Subject of the narrative.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: The subject in so much of our preaching is ourselves.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God is the subject of the verbs.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures are not models of behavior but witnesses to God's action.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Elijah and Isaiah are presented as those who 'stand before' the living God.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and awe; shifting the burden of 'doing' to God.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic grace; God initiates and completes the action.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The sermon is a meta-commentary on narrative coherence itself, demanding that God remain the Subject.
spanning_punten: The tension between God's hiddenness and His activity.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: I work and who can hinder it?

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Severe; sin is seen as turning God into an object of our own searching.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully repositions God as the Subject and humans as the Receiver/Witness.

identificatie_herstel.strategie: Maintain the focus on God's active verbs.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain this imbalance; it is theologically intentional.
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Continue to emphasize God's 'I will' over human 'we must'.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: Strongly identified as idols and imperial power.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This text serves as a masterclass in theocentric homiletics, perfectly aligning with Greimas' actantial model to prioritize Divine agency.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis might focus on the use of satire, the actantial analysis reveals the underlying shift in agency.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the historical context of Isaiah; actantial analysis shows how the text functions as a 'living' narrative for the hearer.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas' model exposes that 'spirituality' often makes the human the Subject and God the Object, a reversal the sermon explicitly fights.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a meta-homiletical reflection on the Actantial Model itself.
